bulk-selection.summary: Bulk selection allows users to select or deselect multiple items in a content view.

card-view.summary: A card view assembles a grid of cards in a gallery.

dashboard.summary: A dashboard provides an overview of key metrics or performance indicators.

filters.summary: Filters allow users to narrow down content from data.

primary-detail.summary: A primary-detail layout shows users a list of items and corresponding details for a selected item.
